beer.beer_description: The Ryemare Before Christmas is a festive Rye Pale Ale with a deliciously dark twist. Earthy, herbal rye meets a light roast, while Riwaka and Eclipse hops bring mandarin, pine, grapefruit, and tropical notes. A brew perfectly suited for misfits, mayhem, and a little Christmas magic.

The Ryemare Before Christmas is a festive Rye Pale Ale with a deliciously dark twist. Earthy, herbal rye meets a light roast, while Riwaka and Eclipse hops bring mandarin, pine, grapefruit, and tropical notes. A brew perfectly suited for misfits, mayhem, and a little Christmas magic.
